<template>
  <form class="add-main-task" @submit.prevent="createTask">
    <input type="text" class="add-main-task__input" placeholder="Add a new task" v-model="add_task"
           @keyup.enter="createTask">
    <button type="submit" class="add-main-task__button"></button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {

}
</script>

</style>
